alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:57PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Franklin and northeastern Crawford Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 157 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Devils Den State Park to Fern. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Mountainburg... Chester... Lee Creek... Lake Fort Smith... Fern... Piney... Locke... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 27 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
